title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\DatabaseInstance
name: DatabaseInstance
description:
A Cloud SQL instance resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.DatabaseInstance

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.kind
params.description: This is always sql#instance.

params.name: data.state
params.description:
The current serving state of the Cloud SQL instance. This can be one of the following.
SQL_INSTANCE_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: The state of the instance is unknown.
RUNNABLE: The instance is running, or has been stopped by owner.
SUSPENDED: The instance is not available, for example due to problems with billing.
PENDING_DELETE: The instance is being deleted.
PENDING_CREATE: The instance is being created.
MAINTENANCE: The instance is down for maintenance.
FAILED: The instance creation failed.

params.name: data.database_version
params.description:
The database engine type and version. The databaseVersion field cannot be changed after instance creation.
MySQL instances: MYSQL_8_0, MYSQL_5_7 (default), or MYSQL_5_6.
PostgreSQL instances: POSTGRES_9_6, POSTGRES_10, POSTGRES_11, POSTGRES_12, or POSTGRES_13 (default).
SQL Server instances: SQLSERVER_2017_STANDARD (default), SQLSERVER_2017_ENTERPRISE, SQLSERVER_2017_EXPRESS, or SQLSERVER_2017_WEB.

params.name: data.settings
params.description: The user settings.

params.name: data.etag
params.description: This field is deprecated and will be removed from a future version of the API. Use the settings.settingsVersion field instead.

params.name: data.failover_replica
params.description: The name and status of the failover replica. This property is applicable only to Second Generation instances.

params.name: data.master_instance_name
params.description: The name of the instance which will act as primary in the replication setup.

params.name: data.replica_names
params.description: The replicas of the instance.

params.name: data.max_disk_size
params.description: The maximum disk size of the instance in bytes.

params.name: data.current_disk_size
params.description: The current disk usage of the instance in bytes. This property has been deprecated. Use the "cloudsql.googleapis.com/database/disk/bytes_used" metric in Cloud Monitoring API instead. Please see this announcement for details.

params.name: data.ip_addresses
params.description: The assigned IP addresses for the instance.

params.name: data.server_ca_cert
params.description: SSL configuration.

params.name: data.instance_type
params.description:
The instance type. This can be one of the following.
CLOUD_SQL_INSTANCE: A Cloud SQL instance that is not replicating from a primary instance.
ON_PREMISES_INSTANCE: An instance running on the customer's premises.
READ_REPLICA_INSTANCE: A Cloud SQL instance configured as a read-replica.

params.name: data.project
params.description: The project ID of the project containing the Cloud SQL instance. The Google apps domain is prefixed if applicable.

params.name: data.ipv6_address
params.description: The IPv6 address assigned to the instance. (Deprecated) This property was applicable only to First Generation instances.

params.name: data.service_account_email_address
params.description:
The service account email address assigned to the instance.
This property is read-only.

params.name: data.on_premises_configuration
params.description: Configuration specific to on-premises instances.

params.name: data.replica_configuration
params.description: Configuration specific to failover replicas and read replicas.

params.name: data.backend_type
params.description:
SECOND_GEN: Cloud SQL database instance.
EXTERNAL: A database server that is not managed by Google.
This property is read-only; use the tier property in the settings object to determine the database type.

params.name: data.self_link
params.description: The URI of this resource.

params.name: data.suspension_reason
params.description: If the instance state is SUSPENDED, the reason for the suspension.

params.name: data.connection_name
params.description: Connection name of the Cloud SQL instance used in connection strings.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Name of the Cloud SQL instance. This does not include the project ID.

params.name: data.region
params.description:
The geographical region. Can be
us-central (FIRST_GEN instances only)
us-central1 (SECOND_GEN instances only)
asia-east1 or europe-west1.
Defaults to us-central or us-central1 depending on the instance type. The region cannot be changed after instance creation.

params.name: data.gce_zone
params.description: The Compute Engine zone that the instance is currently serving from. This value could be different from the zone that was specified when the instance was created if the instance has failed over to its secondary zone.

params.name: data.secondary_gce_zone
params.description: The Compute Engine zone that the failover instance is currently serving from for a regional instance. This value could be different from the zone that was specified when the instance was created if the instance has failed over to its secondary/failover zone. Reserved for future use.

params.name: data.disk_encryption_configuration
params.description: Disk encryption configuration specific to an instance. Applies only to Second Generation instances.

params.name: data.disk_encryption_status
params.description: Disk encryption status specific to an instance. Applies only to Second Generation instances.

params.name: data.root_password
params.description: Initial root password. Use only on creation.

params.name: data.scheduled_maintenance
params.description: The start time of any upcoming scheduled maintenance for this instance.

params.name: data.satisfies_pzs
params.description: The status indicating if instance satisfiesPzs. Reserved for future use.

params.name: data.out_of_disk_report
params.description: This field represents the report generated by the proactive database wellness job for OutOfDisk issues. Writers: -- the proactive database wellness job for OOD. Readers: -- the proactive database wellness job

methods.name: getState
methods.description:
The current serving state of the Cloud SQL instance. This can be one of the following.
SQL_INSTANCE_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: The state of the instance is unknown.
RUNNABLE: The instance is running, or has been stopped by owner.


SUSPENDED: The instance is not available, for example due to problems with billing.
PENDING_DELETE: The instance is being deleted.
PENDING_CREATE: The instance is being created.
MAINTENANCE: The instance is down for maintenance.
FAILED: The instance creation failed.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.DatabaseInstance.SqlInstanceState state = 2;
